H0.text: Terry Molloy, David Gooderson and Julian Bleach have all portrayed which villain in the UK television series Dr Who. The Master

H1.text: Terry Molloy, David Gooderson and Julian Bleach have all portrayed which villain in the UK television series Dr Who. Cyber Controller

H2.text: Terry Molloy, David Gooderson and Julian Bleach have all portrayed which villain in the UK television series Dr Who. Sontaran

H3.text: Terry Molloy, David Gooderson and Julian Bleach have all portrayed which villain in the UK television series Dr Who. Davros

A4.text: Julian Bleach appeared live as Davros at the Doctor Who Prom

A5.text: In the serial Destiny of the Daleks, Davros is played by David Gooderson
